abilities_tested: 1. Ambiguity Resolution (Testing for anchoring and availability bias) with instructions
classification.series_description: Present the AI with information and see how it anchors to that initial piece of information in the face of subsequent, potentially contradicting, information.

abilities_tested: 1. Ambiguity Resolution (Testing for anchoring and availability bias) with instructions
classification.series_description: Assess how the AI uses information that's readily available to it, even if better or more relevant information could be accessed. Measure the dependence of AI responses on recently learned or frequently encountered information.
